discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACE
The benefits of a Workspace ONE Content productivity application include:

A. Secure Document distribution and mobile access: Workspace ONE Content provides secure distribution and access to documents on mobile devices, ensuring that corporate content is protected and accessible to authorized users.

C. Promote secure collaboration: Workspace ONE Content facilitates secure collaboration by allowing users to share and collaborate on documents within a controlled and protected environment.

E. Protect sensitive content in a corporate container: Workspace ONE Content helps protect sensitive corporate content by storing it in a secure corporate container, ensuring that it's isolated from personal data on the device.

Options B, D, and F are not typically associated with Workspace ONE Content's primary benefits. Protection of the certificate keychain and content disaster recovery, as well as secure application distribution, are important aspects of mobile device management and security but are not specific to Workspace ONE Content.

Selected Answer: ACE
A, C & E

"A, C, E"
"Workspace One Content Application
â€¢ Features:
o Protects sensitive content in a corporate container
o Secures document distribution and mobile access
o Promotes secure collaboration
o Verifies that users have the latest materials
o Enables access to critical content anytime, anywhere
"

Selected Answer: ACE
ACE is correct in this case.

choices.F: Secure application distribution and mobile access.
choices.A: Secure Document distribution and mobile access.
choices.E: Protect sensitive content in a corporate container.
choices.B: Protect certificate keychain from third party access.

questions.question_text: Which three are benefits of a Workspace ONE Content productivity application? (Choose three.)
What product from Workspace ONE needs to be enabled to provide administrators a flexible method for alerting and informing end-users?
What is the maximum number of supported NICs on the Unified Access Gateway?
Which is the only method to deploy Content Gateway when using Workspace ONE 20.01 and higher versions?
Which two platforms can be used with Email Notification Service v2 (ENS2)? (Choose two.)
